item.description:
August 20th is the fundraising deadline for the first reporting period before the primary, Sept. 11th.

We're asking all those who believe "death is not the worst of evils" to donate to a pro-liberty candidate who is fighting for the NH and US Constitutions.

Our goal is $5,000 in one day, so even if you can only contribute $5, $10, or $25 dollars, every bit helps.

Please donate at http://andysanborn.com/donate or right here on our
Facebook page through Piryx: https://www.facebook.com/andy4senate/app_121629204551128

You can also sign up for our email list to get a reminder on the day of: http://eepurl.com/gexR

Please help us spread the word by inviting your friends to this event!
item.name: Andy Sanborn's "Live Free or Die" Money Bomb
